phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Neon Genesis Evangelion
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Mune no door wo tataitemo
Tear open the door to your heart...
Watashidake wo tada mitsumete
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Hohoenderu anata
Standing there smiling serenely.
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Unmei sae mada shiranai
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
Dakedo itsuka kizuku deshou
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Haruka mirai mezasu tameno
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Zankoku na tenshi no thesis
The cruel angel's thesis bleeds...
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
Kono sora wo daite kagayaku.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare.
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
The fiction has become the reality.
How ironic, that the experiment's advocate became its victim.
So, you believe that the Contact Experiment was the direct because?
Her mental breakdown was a result of the contact.
Even so, this is too cruel,
committing suicide and leaving such a young girl behind.
Perhaps, but I believe there may have been additional causes.
Asuka darling, Mama cooked your favorite for you.
Oh, no, you have to eat this, or that girl will laugh at you.
She is like that every day.
She sits there talking to that doll as if it were her real daughter.
I think it is because of the guilt she must feel.
She devoted her life to research, not to taking care of her daughter.
I sympathize with your grief.
But it is like looking at porcelain figures of a mother and her child.
Perhaps not much is different between humans and dolls.
Man creates dolls in his own image.
If God exists, it is possible that we are all just dolls to him.
That does not make you sound like much of a modern physician.
I may be a doctor, but I am a human being and a woman first.
You are a strong girl, Asuka, but it is all right if you want to cry.
I am okay.
I will not cry.
I can think for myself.
Can you hear me, Asuka?
Your synch ratio has dropped an entire eight points.
Do not think of anything else, just concentrate the way you used to.
I am trying!
Asuka's synch ratio is getting lower and lower.
This is extremely troublesome.
We do not have a spare now.
Maybe we would better make repairing Rei's Unit 00 top priority.
We cannot afford to repair them both at the same time.
Mitosis in Unit 02's left arm has cleared the numerical requirement.
Necrosis development is currently under point zero five percent.
Apotheosis process is in nominal status.
Unit 00's regeneration process is currently stable.
Connecting receptors to the secondary terminals.
The Eva series was born from Adam.
Now we are using the force which caused the Second Impact
to defeat the Angels.
Attempting to harness the engine of our own destruction.
Only humans are so foolish.
After all, I myself hate the Evas.
Revenge for my father?
Major Katsuragi!
They have started construction on Evas up through Unit 13?
At seven different locations around the world?
This is information that came via Shanghai.
The source is reliable.
Why are they speeding up the construction process now?
Well, we have lost two Evas recently,
and two more Evas are currently severely damaged.
So I would assume that they are accelerating
to create a reserve force for their contingency plans.
Perhaps...
But we have been receiving spare parts from Germany
that were originally intended for Eva Units 05 and 06.
They have been spending a lot of cash lately.
They just doubled the budget.
I think the brass are being driven by something.
Yeah, I can feel the Committee's impatience.
Well, could they be doing this in anticipation
of intercepting multiple Angels at once?
Could be.
Except there is no reason for them to do it outside official channels.
There must be some other reason.
This is the first time we have gotten together in a while,
so what is with the gloomy atmosphere?
I am finished.
Asuka!
I am not getting it.
After all, it is probably Kaji calling for you.
I am not getting it.
After all, it is probably Kaji calling for you.
You should get it.
Never again.
Oh no, I am sorry that our mighty invincible Shinji
should have to be bothered with such a thing.
Yes, hello?
I cannot stand the way he is so aloof!
It is a call from Germany for Asuka.
It is your mother.
For me?
My mama?
Give me that!
Hallo Mutter!
Wir haben uns lange nicht gehort...
When she is speaking in a different language, she seems like a different person.
Ach, niemals.
Er ist ein einsamer Mensch...
Ja, ja, wirklich?
Ach, so...
Das ist aber toll...
Mother...
Hoffentlich gibt's keinen Regen.
Ich muB ins Bett.
Auf Wiederhoren.
Gute Nacht.
You were on the phone quite a while.
Well, it was just a routine periodic communication.
I wish I could talk with my family.
Well, it is just for show.
She is not my real mother.
But it is not like I hate her or anything.
I just feel uncomfortable talking with her.
Why am I telling you this?!
Sorry.
I know I have hit rock bottom when I get sympathy from you!
Synchrograph, minus 12.8.
It is barely over the starting indicator.
That is pathetic.
It is a worse score than yesterday.
Asuka's not feeling well, it is the second day of her period.
Synch ratio scores are not influenced by physical disorders.
The problem's in her subconscious.
We may have to replace Unit 02's pilot.
Asuka, you are finished now.
Maintenance of Power Grid 8 will begin this evening at 18:00 hours.
Asuka's pride has been badly damaged.
Maintenance of Power Grid 8 will begin this evening at 18:00 hours.
It is hard to blame her after she was defeated so badly.
Primary Command Center team
It is hard to blame her after she was defeated so badly.
Will meet as scheduled.
Even worse, she feels Shinji beat her.
Will meet as scheduled.
Even worse, she feels Shinji beat her.
All General Affairs personnel are to report to Conference Room 2.
All General Affairs personnel are to report to Conference Room 2.
Maybe it is beyond our limits.
All General Affairs personnel are to report to Conference Room 2.
Maybe it is time for us to stop living together.
So, you have hit your breaking point?
Are you fed up with your nice imitation family?
That from someone who uses cats to fill the holes in her own life.
I am sorry.
I am just a little upset.
Why do I suffer through this just because I am a girl?
I do not want to have children anyway.
Route 7 Loop is currently closed due to an accident.
Please use Route 12 as a detour.
If you do not open your mind to her, your Eva will not move.
Are you saying that I am shutting myself out?!
Yes, because your Eva has her own mind.
The robot does?
You are aware of it, are not you?
I do not know what happened to make you start talking to me.
It must be an omen of a disaster or something!
What?!
Are you happy that I cannot pilot my Eva?!
Do not worry!
When an Angel comes,
our invincible Shinji will destroy it anyway!
We do not have to fight!
They only need Shinji!
When a wind-up doll like you starts being sympathetic to me,
I have really hit rock bottom.
I am not a doll.
Shut up!
You do anything you are ordered to, do not you?!
You would kill yourself if Commander Ikari told you to, would not you?!
Yes, I would.
Then you are a toy, just like I thought!
You are an unthinking, emotionless doll, and I hate you!
Everyone!
I hate everyone!
Shinji's absent again today.
It is nothing unusual for Ayanami not to show up, but...
Asuka's missing too.
And Suzuhara cannot leave the hospital yet.
I guess it is gotten so serious they cannot come to school anymore.
Eva Unit 02's signals all read nominal.
Connection and fusion of VA's are within normal limits.
The field of proliferation is within the expected range.
You are my doll, so move like I tell you to, and do not argue!
Why does a weapon need a mind?
It just gives you trouble.
Anyway, you must obey my orders!
This is stupid.
All personnel, go to first stage alert!
Prepare for aerial assault!
An Angel?
They are still coming?
Visual confirmation of Angel.
This is maximum magnification.
It is not moving from its orbit.
It is maintaining a constant distance from our position.
So, does that mean that it is looking for a place to land?
Or that it is going to destroy us from up there?
We cannot attack it easily from this position.
Unless it comes into our range, there is nothing we can do.
The Evas cannot destroy an enemy that is in orbit.
What is Rei's status?
She and Unit 00 are both in good condition.
She and Unit 00 are both in good condition.
Understood.
Sortie Unit 00.
Prepare for extreme long range firing.
Unit 02, Asuka, be ready to sortie as her backup.
Backup?
Me? For Unit 00?!
That is right, take the rear guard position.
You cannot be serious.
Eva Unit 02 launch!
Asuka!
It is okay.
Let her take the point if that is what she wants.
Major Katsuragi?!
If she fails this time, Asuka will not be allowed to pilot anymore.
You mean this is her last chance?
Let us start preparing to replace Unit 02's pilot, just in case.
Yes, Madam.
Excuse me, but are not you going to sortie Unit 01?
Excuse me, but are not you going to sortie Unit 01?
It is to remain frozen.
Those are Commander Ikari's orders.
After what happened, it is a good idea.
If I fail this time, they are not going to let me pilot anymore.
You cannot make any mistakes this time, Asuka.
The target is still out of range.
Why in the hell are you so slow?!
Come on down, you lazy Angel!
The Angel has a particle beam weapon?!
No, there are no thermal emissions being detected.
We have got abnormal readings in her psychograph!
Mental contamination is about to begin!
The Angel's making a psychic attack?
The Angels cannot understand our minds that well!
God damn it!
Positrons dissipated!
It is not working!
It is too far out of range!
Unit 02's rifle is out of ammunition.
What is the result of the beam analysis?
It is an energy oscillation pattern on a visible wavelength.
It is similar to an AT Field, but we do not know much more.
How is Asuka?
It is bad!
The mental contamination is crossing her ego borderline!
It is bad!
The mental contamination is crossing her ego borderline!
No!
Do not!
Do not come into me!
No!
No!
No!
No!
Get out of my mind!
Please!
Do not rape my mind!
Asuka!
Psychograph shows she cannot take anymore!
Psychograph shows she cannot take anymore!
Yes, her mental circuits are being destroyed.
This is too dangerous for her.
Asuka!
Retreat!
No!
Asuka!
Retreat!
No!
That was an order!
Asuka, retreat!
That was an order!
Asuka, retreat!
No!
Never!
I would rather die than retreat now!
Asuka!
Accelerator synchronization initiated.
Voltage is increasing.
Approaching pressure zone.
Compulsory focus convergence, activated.
Correction for the Earth's rotation and gravity, point zero three.
Pressure in the chamber is at maximum.
Release the final safety lock.
All personnel, prepare for firing.
No effect!
There was not enough energy
to penetrate its AT Field from this distance.
We are at maximum power output!
We cannot get any more power!
Unit 02's psychograph is getting weak!
What about the LCL mind barrier?
Negative!
We cannot even hope for a buffering effect.
Switch top priority to life support.
Do not allow any feedback.
Yes, Madam!
That ray scanned her mental wavelength, and adapted to it.
Impossible!
Is the Angel trying to analyze a human mind?
Why am I crying?
I swore that I would not cry anymore.
What is wrong, Asuka?
This is a present from your new mother.
Do not you like it?
No!
But why not?
Because I am not a child!
I will grow up faster than other people.
I do not need a stuffed toy.
Please, look at me!
Mama!
I beg you, do not stop being my mama!
Come to Heaven with me.
Mama!
Mama!
Please, do not kill me!
No!
I am not Mama's doll!
I will think for myself, and I will live for myself!
I do not need a papa or mama, I will live on my own.
No!
Do not make me remember that!
I want to forget those things!
Do not dig them up from my mind!
I do not want those terrible memories anymore!
Please, stop this!
Stop this!
My mind's being contaminated.
Kaji!
My mind's being raped!
What will I do?
It is defiling my mind!
Unit 02 has ceased activation!
The life support system has crashed!
Pilot's mind is entering danger zone.
Target position is constant.
Relative distance unchanged.
Possibility of the target coming into Unit 00's range is 0.02.
Could we airlift Unit 00 and try shooting from the sky?
No, we cannot do that.
If the Angel attacked during the approach, we could not protect it.
I will go out in Unit 01!
No!
This target has the ability to attack the pilot's mind.
We cannot allow an invasion of Unit 01.
But that cannot happen as long as I am not defeated, right?
There is no guarantee that you will succeed.
But if we do not, Asuka will...
I do not care.
Rei, go to Dogma and get the Lance.
The Lance of Longinus?!
You cannot do that, Ikari!
It is the only way to kill a target beyond the reach of our AT Fields.
Hurry!
But if Adam and the Eva come into contact,
it might cause the Third Impact!
It is too dangerous!
Commander Ikari, please do not do this!
So, that story was fraudulent too?
The Second Impact was not caused by contact between two Angels.
Opening Central Dogma barriers 10 through 15.
Unit 00 has passed the 6th Malvoisie.
Now opening barriers 16 through 20.
If something like this will not because the Third Impact, then...
What really happened to cause the Second Impact?
Ikari, I still think it is too early to use this.
The committee has already started to mass produce Evas.
This is our chance, Fuyutsuki.
But...
We cannot make time run backwards,
but we can spur its course forward with our own hands.
The old men will not allow this.
Therefore, we must finish this before SEELE has time to act.
It is not acceptable to lose Unit 02 at this time.
But you cannot use the Lance without SEELE's approval.
The need is the justification.
There are no other factors to consider.
Justification?
No, what you are looking for is an excuse.
Unit 02's pilot's EKG has dropped to point zero six.
We are past the limits of the life support system.
Unit 00 is passing through Vent 2.
She is approaching the surface!
That is the Lance of Longinus?
Unit 00 is in position to throw.
Target sighted.
Error corrections have been made.
Starting countdown.
Going from ten.
Zero!
Target annihilated.
Eva Unit 02 is free.
What about the Lance of Longinus?
It passed escape velocity.
It is moving into a lunar orbit.
It is impossible to recover it now.
Yes, Sir.
We have no method to recover an object of that much mass.
Unit 02's psychograph is returning to normal.
Return the Evangelion to the second cage.
Please use Route 67.
How is Asuka?
We have confirmed that the pilot is alive,
We have confirmed that the pilot is alive,
and we have established quarantine for the contamination.
I see.
I am glad you are okay, Asuka.
Shut up!
Who the hell is okay?!
How could it get any worse?
That little bitch rescued me.
That little bitch rescued ME.
I would rather have died!
I hate you!
I hate you!
I hate everyone!
I hate you all!
To be continued...
Preview
Unit 00 is possessed and corroded by an Angel.
In order to protect Shinji from the Angel,
Rei wishes herself dead.
She becomes light and heat to disappear with Tokyo-3.
